1.Name: 2: Boy right foot up
1.Description: A running boy frame with the left foot down and the right foot up.

2.Name: 3: Boy right foot down
2.Description: A running boy frame with the right foot down and the left foot up.

3.Name: 4: Boy long stride
3.Description: A boy running with a long stride and the right foot half-way up.

4.Name: 5: Boy stride landed
4.Description: A running boy with a long stride that landed on the left foot.

5.Name: 6: Boy landed
5.Description: A running boy that has landed in his stride with the right foot down

6.Name: 7: Boy long stride right foot half way down
6.Description: A boy with a long stride. This is the last frame of animation for the boy.

8.Name: 2: Girl right foot up
8.Description: A running girl frame with the left foot down and the right foot up.

9.Name: 3: Girl right foot down
9.Description: A running girl frame with the right foot down and the left foot up.

10.Name: 4: Girl long stride
10.Description: A girl running with a long stride and the right foot half-way up.

11.Name: 5: Girl stride landed
11.Description: A running girl with a long stride that landed on the left foot.

12.Name: 6: Girl landed
12.Description: A running girl that has landed in his stride with the right foot down

13.Name: 7: Girl long stride right foot half way down
13.Description: A girl with a long stride. This is the last frame of animation for the girl.
